about_the_game:
Tap the bubble monsters to move them in a pendulum like swaying movement along the arc. Time the taps carefully so that the monsters do not bump into each other. Get all the monsters in a level swinging to complete the level. Choose the order to tap monsters carefully and get all the three stars in a level.



Beware of spiky in timed levels. Reach new levels and beautiful locations. Get rewarded with power-ups like snails, shields and skips as you clear levels. Build up to greater challenges and tap/swing your way to the finish as the best player!



Swaybods is easy to pick up, but challenging to master. It is a fun and addictive logic puzzle game. It is a brain teaser that needs precise timing!

You’ve got to approach this brain teaser carefully! There are themes you can unlock as you get further, as well as challenges to keep you on your toes. In this fun and colorful game, you challenge your logic, critical thinking, and precision. Do you have what it takes?

Key Features


  • Play the full puzzle game experience offline and on the go.
  • Tap the bubble monsters to swing them like pendulums
  • Innovative gameplay (inspired by pendulums)
  • Fun, colourful and engaging graphics
  • 100 hand crafted levels
  • Levels with progressively increasing difficulty
  • Rewards in the form of power-ups

Why Play Swaybods?
  • Relieve Your Stress.
  • Tease Your Brain With the Satisfying Taps.
  • Practice Your Critical Thinking!
  • Learn the Tricks to Ensure Swaybods Glory!
  • Enjoy Different themes Through Your Journey!

Your reviews are important for the Swaybods team, let us know what you think!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M

name: SwayBods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this puzzle game, tap the bubble monsters to move them in a pendulum like swaying movement along the arc. Time the taps carefully so that the monsters do not bump into each other. Get all the monsters in a level swinging to complete the level.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
